title: Is anyone interested in making an Indian pop band? - Quora

response.answer_text: I am not a singer and not good in instruments either and sorry I am not going for music. I can play Piano at an okay level and Guitar at modest and once I had interest in music, but (from what I know) I would say most people in India go for solo rather than creating bands. I have seen cultural music bands but not pop music bands, though I am sure there are many people who would be interested, maybe you need to join music clubs or a music academy where you will 100% find people who would be interested. And I hope and wish you will be forming an amazing musical group. All The Best.
We have marching bands😂😂 I don’t think so. Singers in India prefer going solo rather than creating a band. There is no band ever created in India.
